A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is a serious bust. It has a lot of moments to like but can't ignore the questions many are asking about from The Force Awakens. This film is just plot over plot and a boring storytelling that comes down short than what is expected. There were a few scenes that weren't necessary. There's a lot of wrong things in this film. It's for sure entertaining but your expectations for the best characters and pacing issues make this film completely empty.
